ul.li: You must have the SECURITY_ADMIN role.
To check currently assigned role(s), select the User ID on the top right hand corner, and click View User Profile from the drop-down list. Assigned roles are displayed.
At least one privilege assigned to a user is required.
Import option cannot be used to change user password.
A user password is required to create a new user profile.

context.p: This tutorial describes the steps to import user profiles from an XML file. Up to 1,000 users can be imported from a single file.

ol.li: Click Import. The file selection window is displayed.

step.info: Select the file to be imported and click Open. A File Parsed window is displayed with the number of user profiles loaded by the imported file.

Click Import All or click Import Only New. Import process starts.
For more information on Import, see Import and Export.

result.p: Import process starts with analysis of file to be imported. The summary is presented in dialog window.
